last_episode_to_air.name: Mermaid Fantasy
last_episode_to_air.overview: With a birthmark covering half her body, Sarah thought she'd never be a bride. That changed when she met Nelson. Then, a surprise pregnancy led to a courthouse ceremony, and now she needs the Queens' help to fulfill her under-the-sea vow renewal dreams.

name: Dragnificent!
overview: At the heart of Dragnificent! are makeovers that tug on the heartstrings, with a team of experts who tackle their challenges by drawing on their individual expertise and overall fabulousness: Alexis Michelle is a makeup artist, specializing in weddings and special events; BeBe is an experienced event planner who can transform any room into a fantasy space; Jujubee, a fashion expert known for her dynamic and iconic looks, draws on her deep knowledge in drag couture and women's fashion; and Thorgy Thor is a classically trained musician who knows how to get the party started.

episodes.name: One Tough Bride
episodes.overview: Corinne is a wrestler who hides her insecurities behind her wrestling persona. The Queens give her an incredible bridal transformation with the confidence to be her true self on her wedding day, but will she go along with it or slam their hard work?

episodes.name: Not Your Typical High School Reunion
episodes.overview: Danyale has been named Queen of her 30th all-class high school reunion and desperately needs the Queens to help her prepare for the coronation! She struggles to find herself beautiful and wonders if she'll ever be ready to be Queen.

episodes.name: Fly Butterfly, Fly
episodes.overview: Amy is throwing herself a butterfly party to celebrate losing 130 pounds. Despite shedding the weight, she doesn't feel beautiful. Amy needs the Queens to help her with a new attitude, wardrobe and glam to fulfill her butterfly fantasy.

episodes.name: You Have The Right To Remain Sassy
episodes.overview: Kari, a quirky bride from Ohio, is on the verge of throwing in the towel with her wedding after losing the ceremony space at the 11th hour. The Queens swoop in to save the day but quickly learn there is more at play than a cancelled venue space.

episodes.name: Pretty in Pink
episodes.overview: Laura, a college professor, is struggling to connect with her son, who wants to be a drag queen. Desperate to understand why anyone would want to become a drag queen, Laura calls the Queens for help. They soon realize Laura needs a lot of help of her own.

episodes.name: Mermaid Fantasy
episodes.overview: With a birthmark covering half her body, Sarah thought she'd never be a bride. That changed when she met Nelson. Then, a surprise pregnancy led to a courthouse ceremony, and now she needs the Queens' help to fulfill her under-the-sea vow renewal dreams.
